statements: DELETE FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = 'e169f285-7aff-4477-9e43-9977563302f8' AND contract_type = 'Electricity';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_buyers WHERE purchase_volume > 1000 AND buyer_type = 'Large Industrial';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = 200 AND buyer_id = 300 OR contract_amount < 5000;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE id = 100 AND amount > 5000;
